casebody.data:
UNITED STATES, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Amiello SORRENTINO and United Perfumery Co., Defendants-Appellants. No. 113. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 20, 1930. Vincent A. O’Connor, of New York City, for appellants. Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Arthur H. Schwartz, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
